content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 3, West Bromwich Albion 1.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 3, West Bromwich Albion 1.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Nicolás Otamendi (Manchester City) because of an injury.
Corner,  West Bromwich Albion. Conceded by Aleksandar Kolarov.
Goal!  Manchester City 3, West Bromwich Albion 1. Hal Robson-Kanu (West Bromwich Albion) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Nyom with a cross.
Foul by Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City).
Chris Brunt (West Bromwich Albion) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Ben Foster.
Attempt saved. Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Attempt saved. Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Fernandinho.
Attempt missed. Fernandinho (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Leroy Sané.
Substitution, Manchester City. Fernando replaces Yaya Touré.
Foul by Hal Robson-Kanu (West Bromwich Albion).
Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt blocked. Fernandinho (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne with a cross.
Substitution, Manchester City. John Stones replaces Vincent Kompany.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Jonny Evans.

Foul by Nyom (West Bromwich Albion).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Craig Dawson.

Substitution, West Bromwich Albion. Hal Robson-Kanu replaces Salomón Rondón.
Leroy Sané (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card.
Leroy Sané (Manchester City) has gone down, but that's a dive.
Foul by Pablo Zabaleta (Manchester City).
Salomón Rondón (West Bromwich Albion) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Ben Foster.

Foul by Vincent Kompany (Manchester City).
Salomón Rondón (West Bromwich Albion) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, West Bromwich Albion. James Morrison replaces Jake Livermore.
Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Claudio Yacob (West Bromwich Albion).
Attempt missed. Salomón Rondón (West Bromwich Albion) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by James McClean with a cross.
Substitution, Manchester City. Pablo Zabaleta replaces David Silva.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Salomón Rondón.
Attempt missed. Vincent Kompany (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Nyom.
Goal!  Manchester City 3, West Bromwich Albion 0. Yaya Touré (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sergio Agüero.
Foul by Fernandinho (Manchester City).
Chris Brunt (West Bromwich Albion) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne.
Craig Dawson (West Bromwich Albion) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Craig Dawson (West Bromwich Albion).
Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, West Bromwich Albion. James McClean replaces Marc Wilson.

Second Half begins Manchester City 2, West Bromwich Albion 0.
First Half ends, Manchester City 2, West Bromwich Albion 0.
